titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Films FA753

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2016-10-30 06:56:49 -0400.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: All inquiries to view films require advanced notice of at least 48 business hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those that are not available in modern formats, may require creation of an access surrogate. Applicable charges will apply.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains films originating from Rockefeller University records, as well as various laboratories and the papers of select faculty.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Film of a meeting between Christian B. Anfinsen (National Institute of Health), Stanford Moore (Rockefeller University), and William H. Stein (Rockefeller University).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: From WABC-TV with reporter Melba Tolliver visiting Dr. Rene Dubos in his RU laboratory and office. Discusses high school and local history, walk through neighborhood with wife Jean Dubos.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Interview of Dr. Rene Dubos by reporter Earl Ubel (WCBS-TV) at RU campus. Discusses destruction of the environment, mismanagement of urban life, deterioration of the city, child development, effects of pollution on children, and the East River Drive waterfront.
